attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition to show support to gain Derek Young Captaincy of Aberdeen Football Club. 

Derek is a hard-working player and is an honest profesional. He is also a loyal servant to Aberdeen Football Club.

Derek Deserves to be The Captain of Aberdeen and to lead them on in Europe and to lift there first trophy in years.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
